thread.title: RHOA’s Cynthia Bailey Celebrates 50th Birthday With Gorgeous Nude Photo
thread.title_full: RHOA’s Cynthia Bailey Celebrates 50th Birthday With Gorgeous Nude Photo

author: Jessica Bennett
title: RHOA’s Cynthia Bailey Celebrates 50th Birthday With Gorgeous Nude Photo
text:
February 21, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Real Housewives of Atlanta star Cynthia Bailey turned 50 years old this Sunday, and celebrated the milestone by stripping down and letting the guys and girls half her age know she’s still got it! 

The always tasteful Cynthia celebrated her 50th birthday by posting this gorgeous black-and-white photo, showcasing her nude bod for all of her Instagram fam to admire. 
A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 19, 2017 at 11:12am PST 
The reality star also spent her big day in Beverly Hills, getting dolled up and hitting the town for her birthday dinner at Riviera 31 at Sofitel. 
A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:32am PST A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:49pm PST 
Cynthia’s night was a star-studded affair, with good friends like Basketball Wives star Jennifer Williams and Love & Hip Hop: Hollywood ’s Jason Lee wishing the timeless beauty a happy birthday. 
A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:32pm PST A post shared by Jennifer Williams (@jenniferwilliams) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:26am PST 
The model also revealed that she actually looks forward to getting older and aging gracefully, quoting actress Susan Sarandon beneath one of her celebratory pics! 
A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:49pm PST A post shared by Cynthia Bailey (@cynthiabailey10) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:00pm PST 
While her RHOA co-stars didn’t make it to the Los Angeles party, Nene Leakes sent well wishes via Instagram. 
A post shared by NeNe Leakes (@neneleakes) on Feb 19, 2017 at 8:04am PST 
This only seems right, as Cynthia threw Nene her own 50th birthday party just two months ago. 
Kenya Moore also praised the birthday girl, saying she’s been an amazing friend over the years. 
A post shared by Kenya Moore (@thekenyamoore) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:00am PST 
Happy birthday, Cynthia!
